menu.change_config_desc: Change the spider name and proxy configuration
menu.change_layout_desc: Change the page type to be scraped

helper.title: How to use ?
helper.content: Hover the layout, you will notice that you can interact with the elements of the page. When clicking on an element, a new configuration drawer will appear on the right where you'll be able to configure the selectors to apply
helper.example_url: Example of URL to be scraped
helper.example_url_desc: Enter an example of URL, this will enable to evaluate the selectors for the elements to be scraped
